芓字的基本解释

芓
zì
古同“茡”。
堤。

芓
zǐ
古同“秄”。

芓字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zì］
［《廣韻》疾置切，去志，從。］
(1)麻的雌株。
(2)泛指麻。
[②]［zǐ］
［《集韻》祖似切，上止，精。］
同“耔1”。
以土壅禾根。

芓字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　芓； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页1018第22
【唐韻】疾置切，音字。【說文】麻母也。一曰芓，卽枲也。　又【博雅】隄也。　又【正韻】祖似切，音子。與耔通。【周禮·天官】甸師帥其屬，而耕耨王籍。【註】耨，芸芓也。　又音慈。【前漢·食貨志】引《詩》曰：或芸或芓。讀作平聲。　又【集韻】津之切，音兹。草名。芸也。　亦作茡。

芓字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体旧字形
芓字的起名意思

堤。古同“秄”，一种植物。

芓
Basic explanation of words
芓
zì
Ancient with "茡".
embankment.
芓
zǐ
The ancient same "秄".
芓
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zì］
["Guangyun" set cut, go to the record, follow. ]
(1) Female plant of hemp.
(2) Refers to hemp in general.
[②]［zǐ］
["Jiyun" ancestors are like cut, top stop, fine. ]
Same as "耔1".
He roots with soil.
芓
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Characters] 　芓; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 1018 Page 22
【Tang Yun】Strictly set and cut, phonetic characters. [Said the text] Ma mother also. One said 芓, 卽枲也.　[Bo Ya] Diya.　[Zhengyun] The ancestor is like cut, sound. Connect with the scorpion. [Zhou Li·Tianguan] Master Dian is a commander of his own, while Gengxu is a king. [Note] Xun, Yun Ling also.　You Yinci. [Previous Han·Shihuo Zhi] Quoting from "Poetry": either Yun or Qian. Read as flat sound.　[Jiyun] Tsuzhiqie, Yinzi. Cursive name. Yun Ye.　 also made 茡.
芓
